title: Vincent Kompany - Wikipedia
snippet: Vincent Jean Mpoy Kompany (born 10 April 1986) is a Belgian professional football manager and former player who played as a centre-back. He is the head coach of Bundesliga club Bayern Munich. As a player, he is best known for his eleven seasons at Manchester City, eight of which he served as ...

title: FC Bayern Munich - Wikipedia
snippet: On 29 May 2024, Vincent Kompany was confirmed as the new head coach of Bayern and received a three-year contract. Bayern started the 2024–25 Bundesliga with a 3–2 win at VfL Wolfsburg. On 5 May 2025, they won their 33rd Bundesliga title (34th German title) after a 2–2 draw between SC ...

title: Vincent Kompany signs new deal with Bayern Munich | Bundesliga
snippet: Top of the table for the past 43 matchdays, Bayern Munich are soaking up the vibes laid down by taskmaster Vincent Kompany. 28.11.2025 · The two coaches go head-to-head in what promises to be another enthralling edition of Der Klassiker.18.10.2025

title: Vincent Kompany succeeds Thomas Tuchel as Bayern Munich head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Bayern Munich have named Vincent Kompany as their replacement for Thomas Tuchel in the head coaching role.

title: Bayern Munich head coach Vincent Kompany signs new contract until 2029 - The Athletic
snippet: Oct. 21, 2025 ... Bayern Munich head coach Vincent Kompany has signed a new contract at the club until 2029.
